name: Quesadillas
ingredients:
Onion, diced
2 garlic cloves, crushed
1 tsp cumin seeds
1.5 cups (dry) pinto beans, cooked
2 tsp paprilka
tortillas
cheese to taste
coriander
directions:
1. Fry onion and garlic. Add cumin.
2. Add beans and spices to pan. Mash to break apart. Season well.
3. Spread over tortillas with cheese (and anything else you like). 
4. Cook in a hot cast iron pan until lightly browned. 
5. Serve warm.
